@Osmose Ok -- everything from round 2 of review has been fixed or at least addressed in some way.

The tests are hard. You're right that they are too tightly coupled to the HTML. If we do a shallow render like in the recipeForm test, that's really all we can test - the HTML. I ran into a lot of problems trying to do a full render in order to test the methods on the components (setting up a store, having to import all dependencies for child components, etc), so testing the HTML at least provided some kind of validation that interactions were working as expected.

That said, there's now something wrong with importing the component files for testing purposes anyway. So I will work on those. But feel free to review the other changes in the meantime.
